welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aldridge, a charming town known for its quaint shops, picturesque surroundings, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the beauty and charm this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport primarily serves low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport primarily serves major airlines and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
